name: Mühleberg
description:
Mühleberg is an Game created for the Abandoned Game Jam #2
I could'nt work for the whole time of the Jam, so it isn't nearly as it should be.

The Development for the Game will probably be continued after Jam, because the Idea is kinda cool.

Game Story:

After a flooding of the nearby dam near the federal city of Switzerland, the pumps of the Mühleberg nuclear power plant were shut down and an unprecedented super Gau of twenty times the size of the Chernobyl accident was triggered.
Now 2 months after the accident no support is sent to the survivors because of the strong radioactivity and there were found mysterious occurrences in the vicinity of the accident site.

Thanks for reading!
